summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 7.8°C) and feels like temperature (down 6.7°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 10897 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles), light levels (up 11627 lux), and cloud levels (up 186 m) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; hot temperatures throughout the day. Also, neither too dry nor too humid and a light breeze will be noticeable. A few light raindrops may fall, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Weather patterns to stay the same.
